p: In the present paper, we found that PLT was lower in the influenza virus infection group (169.869 ± 93.379) than in the negative control group (226.209 ± 119.245) ( P < .001), while Hb was higher ( P < .05). Moreover, the other routine blood parameters did not differ significantly between the two groups ( P > .05) (Table 3). In addition, L and PLT increased to normal levels concomitantly when influenza patients were completely cured ( P < .05). Furthermore, no other hematological parameters were found to have significance with a complete cure of influenza ( P > .05) (Table 4).
